tasks.label: port-forward-gdb
tasks.command: POD=$(kubectl get pods -l app=srv --field-selector=status.phase=Running -o jsonpath='{.items[0].metadata.name}') && kubectl port-forward $POD 7777:7777

tasks.label: copy-remote-binary
tasks.command: POD=$(kubectl get pods -l app=srv --field-selector=status.phase=Running -o jsonpath='{.items[0].metadata.name}') && kubectl cp $POD:/src/app ./app.remote || echo 'Warning: Could not copy remote binary'
